items.sentence: The immunity from vaccines can wear off, which means booster vaccines might be needed.

Here is a picture of my younger brother Tom, and here is one of my older brother John.
Tom is always a little irritable in the morning before he has his first cup of coffee.
Many people in England would like to see the public subsidy of the monarchy abolished.
There is no way that my punctuation in French can be perfect, though I keep on trying.
I wish I was smart enough to invent something that sold well enough for me to get rich.
I would like to drastically decrease the amount of time it takes me to clean the house.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to be able to convince Mary to go to the dance with him.
Sometimes you don\'t need to speak the same language in order to understand each other.
